this_title: เดือนพราง Pilot
trans_title: เดือนพราง ชุดนักบิน
เดือนพราง ตัวอย่างภาพยนตร์
เดือนพราง รถพ่วง
introduction: 山脚下，一栋两层大的古宅雄伟地矗立在大自然之中，散发着神秘而耐人寻味的气息，等待着来自国外的工作组的到来，其中有一位年轻而充满活力的文案撰稿人Khen。这个生态度假村那种让人毛骨悚然的氛围，还有走廊尽头房间里神秘女人的恐怖，对于那些没有丝毫触觉的人来说都不是问题，但....Kh en除外。甚至在他出了意外，暂时失去意识后，他还是看到了不该看到的东西、听到了不该听到的事情，并遇到了马修·马斯·柯勒律治，他是前房东的儿子，他的名字与月亮的意思相同。俩人的关系也随着每个夜晚而有更深的变化，残酷的谜团也慢慢展开，无情地侵入他们的生活。~~改编自紫雨的小说《隐藏的月亮》(เดือนพราง)。At the foot of the mountain, a two-story old house stands majestic in nature, emitting a mysterious and intriguing atmosphere, waiting for the arrival of a working group from abroad, including a young and energetic copywriter Khen.The creepy atmosphere of this eco-resort and the horror of the mysterious woman in the room at the end of the corridor are not a problem for those who have no sense of touch, except ... Khen.Even after he had an accident and temporarily lost consciousness, he saw things he shouldn't have seen, heard things he shouldn't have heard, and met Matthew Maas Coleridge, the son of his former landlord, whose name means the same as the moon.The relationship between the two people also changes more deeply with each night, and the cruel mystery slowly unfolds and ruthlessly invades their lives.~~ Adapted from the novel "The Hidden Moon" (เดือนพราง) by Violet Rain.
foreign_title: เดือนพราง Pilot
